content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If we had agreed on a final price, it would have been 1250 euros per month. However, since we did not agree, I cannot provide an exact number.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how likely would you be to recommend Peter as a negotiation partner to a friend? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, I would rate Peter as a 5 in terms of likelihood to recommend as a negotiation partner to a friend.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: Since I did not feel discriminated or offended, I cannot provide a reason for this.
name: Haoyu Wang
